resources.string: Not familiar with book names, use \'List\' button below.
This is 66 names in a bible. You can choose one.
Bibles Connect is for people who want to read different bibles at the same time.\n
This app is distributed under the Creative Commons BY-NC license. All the Bible versions are property of their respective owners. All rights reserved to the owners.

Ostervald French Bible, a revision of the French translation as public domain, in particular, was long well known and much valued in Britain.
RVR, La Biblia Reina-Valera Spanish Translation
Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested
